overview:
Lucy McAllister is a lawyer serving the San Francisco Bay area. A criminal defense and family law expert, she has handled over 100 Superior Court trials and has served as a judge on a number of occasions.

Attorney McAllister acquired her J.D. from the Santa Clara University School of Law, and earned her license from the State Bar of California. Recognized for her expertise in the intricacies of California law, she teaches at the University of San Francisco Law School, Summer Trial Advocacy Program.
